document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA TAXICAB COMMISSION ADJUDICATORY AMENDMENT ACT OF 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-107 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-342, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 30, 1990, and February 13, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 28, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-161 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
